mapper.select: SELECT ID , TITLE , CONTENTS , AUTHOR , CREATE_USER , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME FROM CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE_BOARD
SELECT ID , TITLE , CONTENTS , AUTHOR , CREATE_USER , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME FROM CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
